channel.title: HALCON: Tips of the Day
channel.description: Tips and tricks for HALCON users.

item.title: Organize Windows
item.description: When having many overlapping windows, to regain the overview and making the four most important HDevelop windows accessible again, use 'Window -> Organize Windows' (Ctrl+Shift+W,O).
item.author: MVTec Software GmbH, webmaster@mvtec.com

item.title: Move the Tool Bar
item.description: If the height of the main window is not sufficient, you can get some more height by dragging the elements of the tool bar by their dragging points from the top to the side of the main window.
item.author: MVTec Software GmbH, webmaster@mvtec.com

item.title: Use the Full Screen
item.description: If the height of the main window is not sufficient, you can get some more height using 'Window -> Full Screen' (Ctrl+Shift+W,F) to fade out the window title.
item.author: MVTec Software GmbH, webmaster@mvtec.com

item.title: Output Console
item.description: To open the output console with a log of the most recent messages including HALCON low-level errors, double-click on the message area of the status bar.
item.author: MVTec Software GmbH, webmaster@mvtec.com

item.title: Feature Histogram
item.description: To easily select regions or contours depending on their shape, use the 'Feature Histogram', which can be found in the tool bar.
item.author: MVTec Software GmbH, webmaster@mvtec.com

item.title: Gray Histogram
item.description: To interactively find the correct parameters for the 'threshold'-operator, use the 'Gray Histogram', which can be found in the tool bar.
item.author: MVTec Software GmbH, webmaster@mvtec.com

item.title: Create Procedures from Code
item.description: To create procedures from existing code, simply select the corresponding code in the program listing and open the procedure interface dialog using 'Procedures -> Create New Procedure...' (Ctrl+Shift+P,C) to setup the new procedure.
item.author: MVTec Software GmbH, webmaster@mvtec.com

item.title: Password-protected Procedures
item.description: Procedures and procedure libraries can be protected with a password to protect your intellectual property.
item.author: MVTec Software GmbH, webmaster@mvtec.com

item.title: Procedure Documentation
item.description: HDevelop procedures can be documented like operators. The documentation may include a detailed description of the functionality of the procedure, example code, links to other procedures or operators, and concise documentation of each parameter.
item.author: MVTec Software GmbH, webmaster@mvtec.com

item.title: Status Bar
item.description: The status bar at the bottom of the main window displays status information, e.g., context-sensitive information about a specific user action or the runtime of operator or procedure calls.
item.author: MVTec Software GmbH, webmaster@mvtec.com

item.title: Information about Operators
item.description: For information concerning individual program lines, double click them so that the name of the applied operator and its parameters are displayed in the operator window. There, the help button provides specific information.
item.author: MVTec Software GmbH, webmaster@mvtec.com

item.title: Parameter Order in Operator Calls
item.description: The order of parameters in an operator call is always: 1) iconic input objects (e.g., images), 2) iconic output objects, 3) control input arrays (e.g., numbers and strings), and 4) control output arrays.
item.author: MVTec Software GmbH, webmaster@mvtec.com

item.title: Scope of Variables
item.description: HDevelop supports local and global variables. All variables are local by default, i.e., they exist only within their procedure.
item.author: MVTec Software GmbH, webmaster@mvtec.com

item.title: Just-in-time Compilation
item.description: HDevelop supports just-in-time (JIT) compilation of procedures for optimized performance of HDevelop programs. The JIT compiler is enabled in the “experienced user” settings of the preferences dialog.
item.author: MVTec Software GmbH, webmaster@mvtec.com

item.title: Save Window
item.description: To save the content of the current Graphics Window into an image, right-click in the Graphics Window and choose the 'Save Window...' entry from the context menu (Ctrl+Shift+G,S).
item.author: MVTec Software GmbH, webmaster@mvtec.com

item.title: Inspect Pixels
item.description: The gray value and image coordinates of a pixel at the position of the mouse cursor are displayed in the status bar or, holding down the Ctrl key, next to the mouse cursor.
item.author: MVTec Software GmbH, webmaster@mvtec.com

item.title: Mouse Precision
item.description: You can select the precision in which the mouse positions are returned using 'Visualization -> Position Precision'. By default, integer values are used (precision 0).
item.author: MVTec Software GmbH, webmaster@mvtec.com

item.title: Interactive ROI Generation
item.description: The Graphics Window provides a tool bar icon to access the ROI window. There, you can interactively draw ROIs and XLDs and perform simple measurements.
item.author: MVTec Software GmbH, webmaster@mvtec.com

item.title: Drag-and-Drop Images
item.description: To open an image from file you can simply drag it from a file browser to the HDevelop window and drop it there.
item.author: MVTec Software GmbH, webmaster@mvtec.com

item.title: Scatter Plot
item.description: To generate a scatter plot of a pair of numeric tuples of equal length, right-click it in the Variable Window (select both tuples simultaneously using the Ctrl key) and use the 'Plot as X/Y pair(s)' entry from the context menu.
item.author: MVTec Software GmbH, webmaster@mvtec.com

item.title: Inspect Variables
item.description: You can open an inspection window of a control variable with variable-specific functionality by double-clicking on it in the Variable Window.
item.author: MVTec Software GmbH, webmaster@mvtec.com

item.title: Inspect 3D Object Models
item.description: You can open an inspection window of a 3D object model with information about the model and the possibility to interactively display it by double-clicking the handle in the Variable Window.
item.author: MVTec Software GmbH, webmaster@mvtec.com

item.title: Live Display
item.description: You can open an inspection window of an image acquisition device with parameter information and the possibility of a live display by double-clicking its handle in the Variable Window.
item.author: MVTec Software GmbH, webmaster@mvtec.com

item.title: Save Variable Content
item.description: You can save the content of a variable to file by right-clicking on the variable name in the Variable Window and using the 'Save' entry from the context menu.
item.author: MVTec Software GmbH, webmaster@mvtec.com

item.title: Copy Variable Content
item.description: To copy the content of a variable, right-click on the name of the control variable in the Variable Window and use the 'Copy' (Ctrl+C) entry from the context menu. Then, you can paste the content (Ctrl+V), e.g., at a selected position in the program listing.
item.author: MVTec Software GmbH, webmaster@mvtec.com

item.title: Profiling Programs
item.description: You can inspect the execution times of single lines of code and thus find bottlenecks in your programs using 'Execute -> Activate Profiler' (Ctrl+Shift+F,F).
item.author: MVTec Software GmbH, webmaster@mvtec.com

item.title: Call Stack
item.description: You can visualize the hierarchy of the procedures that were currently called on HDevelop's internal call stack using 'Execute -> Thread View / Call Stack' (Ctrl+Shift+O,C).
item.author: MVTec Software GmbH, webmaster@mvtec.com

item.title: Operator Suggestions
item.description: When having selected an operator call in the Program Window, the menu 'Suggestions' provides suggestions for alternative, preceding, and succeeding operator calls.
item.author: MVTec Software GmbH, webmaster@mvtec.com

item.title: Tool Tips for a Program Line
item.description: Resting the mouse pointer on an operator, procedure, or variable name within the Program Window displays a tool tip providing specific information, e.g., the name and (parts of) the content of a variable.
item.author: MVTec Software GmbH, webmaster@mvtec.com

item.title: Open Procedures in new Tabs
item.description: To display a procedure in a new tab card, press the Ctrl key while selecting the procedure from the drop-down list of the Program Window.
item.author: MVTec Software GmbH, webmaster@mvtec.com

item.title: Copy Procedures
item.description: To copy an internal procedure that is only open in the Program Window, select 'Procedures -> Duplicate...' and enter a new name in the corresponding dialog.
item.author: MVTec Software GmbH, webmaster@mvtec.com

item.title: Assistants
item.description: You can access assistants that guide you through often needed tasks like image acquisition, camera calibration, matching, 1D measuring, or OCR via the menu 'Assistants'.
item.author: MVTec Software GmbH, webmaster@mvtec.com

item.title: Image Acquisition Assistant
item.description: To acquire images and adjust the parameters of your image acquisition device, use 'Assistants -> Open New Image Acquisition' or the corresponding tool bar button.
item.author: MVTec Software GmbH, webmaster@mvtec.com

item.title: Copy and Paste
item.description: You can start multiple instances of HDevelop to comfortably copy program code and procedures between different HDevelop programs.
item.author: MVTec Software GmbH, webmaster@mvtec.com

item.title: View Procedures
item.description: You can view or edit a selected procedure in a new tab with Alt+Ctrl+Enter.
item.author: MVTec Software GmbH, webmaster@mvtec.com

item.title: Advanced Autocompletion
item.description: Using the Tab key, advanced autocompletion is possible when working with the full text editor.
item.author: MVTec Software GmbH, webmaster@mvtec.com

item.title: Behavior of Return Key
item.description: You can change the behavior of the Return key from 'enter and execute' to 'enter' via 'Edit -> Preferences -> General Options -> General Options' or the corresponding tool bar button in the Program Window.
item.author: MVTec Software GmbH, webmaster@mvtec.com

item.title: Quick Navigation
item.description: You can manage your program lines, e.g., navigate between bookmarked program lines or list lines containing a search term using 'Window -> Open Quick Navigation' (Ctrl+Shift+O,R).
item.author: MVTec Software GmbH, webmaster@mvtec.com

item.title: Set Bookmarks
item.description: You can set temporary bookmarks to quickly navigate between important program lines of large programs using 'Set Bookmark' of the Program Window's context menu (Ctrl+F11).
item.author: MVTec Software GmbH, webmaster@mvtec.com

item.title: Code Export
item.description: You can export your HDevelop programs to several programming languages using 'File -> Export...' (Ctrl+Shift+O,X) or the corresponding tool bar button.
item.author: MVTec Software GmbH, webmaster@mvtec.com
